JOB DESCRIPTION: Required Skills   - Experience developing database driven web-based applications using C#, ASP .NET.   - Good Experience of WCF, Web Services, MVC, Entity Framework, LINQ , Ajax.   - Excellent exposure in Object Oriented Design skills.   - Experience of SQL Server (2008 or later) or other RDBMS, Stored Procedures and reporting services.   - Knowledge of JavaScript framework like JQuery, NodeJS and AngularJS   - Demonstrated problem solving, analytic and troubleshooting skills.
